H0.text: Genever is the old word for what alcoholic drink. Rum

H1.text: Genever is the old word for what alcoholic drink. Vodka

H2.text: Genever is the old word for what alcoholic drink. Whiskey

H3.text: Genever is the old word for what alcoholic drink. GIN

A4.text: The juniper berry (which comes from the Latin juniperus), hence the name jenever (and the English name gin), was used for its alleged medicinal benefits.
